caption.p: Epigenetic alterations are heritable and stable gene expression changes that occur through modifications in the chromosome rather than in the DNA sequence. Epigenetic mechanisms can regulate gene expression via chemical modifications of DNA bases and alterations to the chromosomal structure of DNA.
